mapper.select: select distinct receiver_id receiverId, receiver_name receiverName, receiver_phone receiverPhone, receiver_address receiverAddress, is_default_address isDefault from t_receiver where user_id = #{userId} and valid_state = '1'
mapper.delete: update t_receiver set valid_state = '0' where receiver_id = #{receiverId} and user_id = #{userId} and valid_state = '1'
mapper.update: update t_receiver set receiver_name = #{receiverName}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone}, receiver_address = #{receiverAddress}, is_default_address = #{isDefault} where receiver_id = #{receiverId} and user_id = #{userId} and valid_state = '1'
mapper.select: select distinct receiver_id receiverId from t_receiver where user_id = #{userId} and is_default_address = '1'
